name: Out of Beer
description:
If your Mac gets mad at you for trying to open the game, you'll need to go into System Preferences > Security & Privacy > and allow Out of Beer to be opened manually (select "Open Anyway").

Overview

In Out of Beer, you play as Mavik, an agile lil' badger. The night's still young, but the squad discovers that the brewski supply has been fully depleted. Oh no! It's fully up to Mavik to obtain the brews, which are scattered across three treacherous levels.

FAQ

  • Q: Aria is literally a bird. She can fly. So why isn't she the one swooping the levitating beers herself?
    • A: I don't know.
  • Q: How are the beers just... Floating by themselves? Magnetic levitation? Ionic propulsion? Magic?
    • A: I don't know.
  • Q: Why is the music so loud?
    • A: I don't know.
  • Q: Who's fridge is that in the background of the title screen?
    • A: I don't know... Just kidding, it's mine.
  • Q: Are you actually out of beer IRL?
    • A: Yes :(
  • Q: Will there be a sequel?
    • A: Probably not, but this won't be the last time you'll see Mavik!

Thanks for playing!

- Andy
